name: Seafood Alfredo with Mussels
author: Zac Patterson
summary: Seafood Alfredo with mussels in a white wine sauce. Serve with French baguette bread for dipping or over pasta.
ingredients: ¼ cup olive oil, or more to taste
5 dashes hot sauce (such as Texas Pete®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup unsalted butter, cut into chunks
2 tablespoons grated Romano cheese, or more to taste
directions: Heat oil over medium-high heat in a large skillet
Add mussels and cook for 4 minutes
Stir in wine, garlic, oregano, basil, hot sauce, salt, and pepper; cover and cook until mussels have opened up, 3 to 5 minutes
Discard any mussels that have not opened
Reduce heat to medium, add   and butter, and cook for 1 minute
Stir in Parmesan cheese and simmer for 2 minutes
Serve with grated Romano cheese, lemon wedges, and parsley
